messages.subject: bye for now -- need to focus
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, Just thought I d let you know that I m going to leave the list for a couple weeks or so.  My dh will be out of town and I feel like I just need to
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

Just thought I'd let you know that I'm going to leave the list for a couple
weeks or so. My dh will be out of town and I feel like I just need to focus on
what needs to be done around here -- I'm learning a lot reading the emails,
but it's a huge investment of time, and I often find a good part of the day
gone while I sit and read and respond. Just need a change of pace, I guess.

I'll be back!

Peace,
Amy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
